cause.description:
Read the comment at the bottom of the page.
1. Stop the seige on the Brown home.
2. Acknowledge the lack of any law in Title 26 that requires to common person to file income tax.
3. WAKE PEOPLE UP!
cause.mission: Raise awareness about the unlawful implementation of a 3rd income tax on the people of america.
cause.name: Support Ed and Elaine Brown
